title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly
subTitle: Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones speaks on risk-taking, making bold trades and the Main Street philosophy that fuelled his rise.

title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer
subTitle: Pascal Desroches, the CFO of the American Telephone and Telegraph Company, partners with CEO John Stankey to restructure the firm.

title: Bloomberg Screentime: The Business of Pop Culture
subTitle: The guests discuss AI's creative impact, streaming competition and legacy media's future in today's entertainment revolution.

title: The Mishal Husain Show
subTitle: A respected journalist engages with global leaders and experts, exploring their views on pressing issues, societal trends and the challenges shaping today's world.
